Avalon Framework - Guide - Where to Go next

There's a lot more to study

Each of the pages in this short guide deserves an entire book, and indeed, most of them have a lot of documentation devoted to them. Here we provide you with pointers where else to look for more information, within and outside of Avalon.

Creating Components

After all the information in this guide has sunk in, you're probably itching to write an Avalon component. Our Developing with Avalon guide takes you through doing just that. You can download it as a PDF and read at your leisure (it comes down to 56 printed pages). If that's too much for you, we suggest you get the latest Excalibur release and take those components as an example. One application that uses a lot of those components and is in widespread daily use is Cocoon.

by Leo Simons
